gui.form.base

Class ListBox<T extends Displayable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
      • gui.form.base.ListBox<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, FormObjectWithChildren, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DropDownMenu

    public abstract class ListBox<T extends Displayable>
extends FormObject
implements FormObjectWithChildren
    A class that represents a ListBox in which ListBoxItems exist
